verses.text: Give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* to my \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* my \w meditation|strong="H1901"\w*.

\w Hearken|strong="H7181"\w* unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of my \w cry|strong="H7773"\w*, my \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, and my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for unto thee will I \w pray|strong="H6419"\w*.

My \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* shalt thou \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* will I \w direct|strong="H6186"\w* \add my prayer\add* unto thee, and will look \w up|strong="H6822"\w*.

For thou \add art\add* not a \w God|strong="H0410"\w* that hath \w pleasure|strong="H2655"\w* in \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*: neither shall \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* with thee.

The \w foolish|strong="H1984"\w* shall not \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*: thou \w hatest|strong="H8130"\w* all \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*.\f + \fr 5.5 \ft in…: Heb. before thine eyes\f*

Thou shalt \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* them that \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w leasing|strong="H3577"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w abhor|strong="H8581"\w* the \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* and \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 5.6 \ft bloody…: Heb. man of bloods and deceit\f*

But as for me, I will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add into\add* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*: \add and\add* in thy \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* will I \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* toward thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.\f + \fr 5.7 \ft thy holy…: Heb. the temple of thy holiness\f*

\w Lead|strong="H5148"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* because of mine \w enemies|strong="H8324"\w*; make thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w straight|strong="H3474"\w* before my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 5.8 \ft mine…: Heb. those which observe me\f*

For \add there is\add* no \w faithfulness|strong="H3559"\w* in their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; their \w inward|strong="H7130"\w* part \add is\add* very \w wickedness|strong="H1942"\w*; their \w throat|strong="H1627"\w* \add is\add* an \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w*; they \w flatter|strong="H2505"\w* with their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.\f + \fr 5.9 \ft faithfulness: or, stedfastness\f*\f + \fr 5.9 \ft their mouth: Heb. his mouth, that is, the mouth of any of them\f*\f + \fr 5.9 \ft very…: Heb. wickednesses\f*

\w Destroy|strong="H0816"\w* thou them, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; let them \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by their own \w counsels|strong="H4156"\w*; cast them \w out|strong="H5080"\w* in the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of their \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*; for they have \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* against thee.\f + \fr 5.10 \ft Destroy…: or, Make them guilty\f*\f + \fr 5.10 \ft by…: or, from their counsels\f*

But let all those that put their \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in thee \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*: let them \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* shout for \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*, because thou \w defendest|strong="H5526"\w* them: let them also that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* be \w joyful|strong="H5970"\w* in thee.\f + \fr 5.11 \ft defendest…: Heb. coverest over, or, protectest them\f*

For thou, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, wilt \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*; with \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* wilt thou \w compass|strong="H5849"\w* him as \add with\add* a \w shield|strong="H6793"\w*.\f + \fr 5.12 \ft compass: Heb. crown\f*
